actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow Federal Reserve banks to purchase and sell obligations issued by municipalities and other political subdivisions which have filed petitions under chapter 9 of the Bankruptcy Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to allow Federal Reserve banks to purchase and sell obligations issued by municipalities and other political subdivisions which have filed petitions under chapter 9 of the Bankruptcy Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to allow Federal Reserve banks to purchase and sell obligations issued by municipalities and other political subdivisions which have filed petitions under chapter 9 of the Bankruptcy Act.
